parameters.query: UPDATE leads SET status = 'in_campaign' WHERE id = {{ $json.id }};

return [ { "firstName": "Nazma", "lastName": "Qurban", "jobTitle": "Head Of Sales", "companyName": "Cognism", "emailAddress": "yusuf1999-00@outlook.com", "number": "+44 20 3858 0822", "stage": "Cold", "linkedInURL": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/nazmaqurban", "websiteURL": "https://www.cognism.com", "is_qualified": true, "qualification_reason": "Nazma's LinkedIn activity, specifically her post 'Why you should take the dreaded cold call,' directly aligns with the challenges B2B sales automation (CoreMagnet's service) aims to solve, indicating a strong fit for improving outreach efficiency.", "generated_subject": "Your insights on cold calling, Nazma", "generated_body": "

Nazma,

I saw your insightful post on taking 'the dreaded cold call'. It got me thinking: what if you could dramatically cut down on that 'dreaded' part, by automating the initial outreach for your team at Flooencer?

We help B2B businesses like yours significantly boost conversion rates by using public data for hyper-personalized, automated campaigns.

Would you be open to a quick 2-minute video showing how this works?

Best,

Yusuf

", "generated_subject_step2": "Re: Your insights on cold calling", "generated_body_step2": "

Hi Nazma,

Just checking in on my last email regarding your post on cold calling and scaling outreach. Given your background in sales leadership, I imagine finding efficient ways to generate qualified leads is always top of mind.

Our sales automation solution is specifically designed to streamline those early stages, letting your team focus on high-value conversations rather than manual prospecting.

Any thoughts on how you're currently tackling this?

Regards,

Yusuf

", "generated_subject_step3": "Final follow-up: Cold Calling Case Study", "generated_body_step3": "

Nazma,

I understand you're incredibly busy, so this will be my last email. I thought you might find this useful: we put together a short case study on how a similar B2B company increased their qualified leads by 30% using our personalized automation strategies.

You can check it out here: [Relevant Case Study Link - Placeholder]. If you'd like to explore more at your own pace, feel free to visit our website: [Your Website Link - Placeholder].

All the best,

Yusuf
